name: live
entry: Start live environment      // Recovery env and Personal Use Only licensing

name: desktop
entry: Install openbox desktop     // Full X11 env and Personal Use Only licensing

name: laptop
entry: Install openbox laptop      // Desktop + config and Personal Use Only licensing

name: netbook
entry: Install openbox netbook     // Lite + office, networking and android apps

name: theater
entry: Install openbox theater     // Lite + media apps and Personal Use Only licensing

name: server
entry: Install openbox server      // Lite + server apps and Personal Use Only licensing

name: lite
entry: Install openbox lite        // Shell + functional lite X11 desktop env

name: shell
entry: Install openbox shell       // Full bash base to build your own desktop env from

name: base
entry: Install openbox base        // Minimal bash with pacman to build your own system
